itunes:title: The Debrief w/ Jocko and Dave Berke #20: How To Get a New Team On Track as a New Leader. How to Align Departments.
title: The Debrief w/ Jocko and Dave Berke #20: How To Get a New Team On Track as a New Leader. How to Align Departments.
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
description:
Taking on a new leadership role. Trying to get the new team "on track" when they're working on the "wrong stuff".


How to align two different departments.



Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/jocko-podcast/exclusive-content
